objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0A1128'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1D1D1D'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#00A8E8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#9013FE'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF4D4D'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='#13294B' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#1F1F1F' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0 600 L1080 200' stroke='url(#accentGrad)' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M0 650 L1080 250' stroke='url(#accentGrad)' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.4'/><path d='M0 700 L1080 300' stroke='url(#accentGrad)' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='80' fill='#00A8E8' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='120' fill='#9013FE' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='950' cy='200' r='60' fill='#FF4D4D' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
24" Full HD 1080p
1800R Screen Curvature
98% sRGB Color Accuracy
Built-in Speakers

product_details.name: Sceptre Curved 24-inch Gaming Monitor 1080p R1500 98% sRGB HDMI x2 VGA Build-in Speakers, VESA Wall Mount Machine Black (C248W-1920RN Series)
product_details.description: 24" Diagonal viewable curved screen HDMI, VGA & PC audio in ports Windows 10 compatible Contemporary sleek metal design with the C248W-1920RN, a slender 1800R screen curvature yields wide-ranging images that seemingly surround you. Protection and comfort are the hallmarks of this design as the metal pattern brush finish is smooth and pleasing to the touch. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) provides stunning color and picture detail on a 24 inch screen. Enjoy HDMI or VGA input to connect all video and gaming devices. Contrast Ratio : 3000: 1

banner_details:
This banner design features a prominent product image ("product_image") of a curved gaming monitor placed on the right half, slightly angled for a dynamic look. The background utilizes a layered composition of dark diagonal shapes with vibrant line accents and translucent circles, giving it a modern tech vibe. The heading ("heading") and subheading ("subheading") are positioned near the top-left, drawing immediate attention with bold, futuristic fonts. A short features description ("description") lies below with concise bullet points. The price ("price") is emphasized in a large, clean font, followed by a rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") reading "SHOP NOW". The layout balances sleek product imagery with a clear marketing message.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #0A1128
- Charcoal Gray: #1D1D1D
- Accent Blue: #00A8E8
- Vibrant Purple: #9013FE
- Bold Red: #FF4D4D
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and dynamic color palette, ideal for an attention-grabbing advertisement banner. Dominant colors include Aqua Blue (#00B8D4), Electric Purple (#9C27B0), Fiery Orange (#FF5722), Sunny Yellow (#FFEB3B), and Hot Pink (#E91E63). These colors transition smoothly across the screen in a liquid or water droplet effect, blending naturally while keeping their vibrancy. The use of white (#FFFFFF) for the bold “SCEPTRE” logo contrasts effectively against the saturated background, enhancing brand visibility. The monitor’s black bezel (#212121) grounds the composition. Together, these high-energy colors evoke clarity, modern appeal, and immersive visual performance.
